smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.util.Log' is unused.
The import 'android.os.Environment' is unused.
Function parameter v is unused.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file BitmapUtils.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file MahouCanvasView.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class BitmapUtils only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (this.x * this.x + this.y * this.y) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this.x * this.x + this.y * this.y
Parentheses in (2.0 * Math.PI / this.vertexCount.toDouble()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 2.0 * Math.PI / this.vertexCount.toDouble()

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class Vector contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called plus
The data class Vector contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called minus
The data class Vector contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called times
The data class Vector contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called size
The data class Vector contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called angle

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
